titles.title: Chotto dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikaketekita
A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた
Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!

title: Chotto dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikaketekita
title_english: Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!
title_japanese: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた
title_synonyms: A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
synopsis:
Hinata Sunohara thought defeating the evil overlord and returning to high school in Japan marked the end of his otherworldly adventures. But when Mariabell, his first and most fervent ally from the magical realm, follows him home, his daily life takes a fantastical turn. Just a month after his return, Mariabell, a dark elf with a passionate and slightly obsessive love, declares they're meant to be together forever. Now, Hinata must navigate the halls of high school while living with a magically jealous girlfriend who takes "school crush" to a whole new level. Join them as they tackle life’s unexpected twists in this exhilarating rom-com adventure!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
background: Chotto dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikaketekita has been published in English Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World! by Seven Seas Entertainment under the Ghost Ship imprint since October 8, 2024.
